DESCRIPTION: Orb: Deals damage to ALL enemies.
Orb: Draw a card at the start of your turn. When #yEvoked, draw 2 cards.
Orb: Deals damage to a random enemy at the end of your turn.
Orb: Deals damage to the enemy with the least HP. Damage is boosted by other wolves. When #yEvoked, gain an orb slot.
Orb: Enemies take damage whenever they are debuffed. When #yEvoked, gain #ySadistic #yNature
Deal damage when you apply debuffs.
Orb: Deal damage back when attacked. Gain #yFocus when evoked.
